Drinking alcohol induces drunkenness, and whether that harms or helps you depends on the amount you drink. Drunkenness has two phases.

Positive phase
The positive phase of drunkenness gradually increases your Speech, Strength, Dexterity, and Charisma levels up to a maximum of +4.

Negative phase
Once you reach the negative phase of drunkenness, it begins to gradually reduce your Speech, Strength, Dexterity, and Charisma and Scholarship levels to a maximum of -4. In addition, you will become dizzy and have trouble seeing. If you've had too much alcohol, you may also pass out.
The length of the positive and negative phases of drunkenness is determined by your Drinking skill level. The higher it is, the longer the positive phase lasts and the quicker the negative phase passes. Drunkenness starts to decrease when all the alcohol is absorbed.

If you drink frequently, you can develop an addiction that is hard to get rid of.

The length of the positive and negative phases of drunkenness is determined by your Drinking skill level. The higher it is, the longer the positive phase lasts and the quicker the negative phase passes. Drunkenness starts to decrease when all the alcohol is absorbed.

If you drink frequently, you can develop an addiction that is hard to get rid of.

Medieval law consisted of land law, municipal law and canon law, or church law. It therefore depends very much on which jurisdiction a particular dispute or its parties fall under. Moreover, the more local is the range of the dispute, the more local customs, habits and traditions come into play. This is what your nimble tongue and sharp intellect can often take advantage of.

Medieval law consisted of territorial, municipal, and canonical or ecclesiastical law. Therefore, it's crucial which jurisdiction a particular dispute or its participants belong to. Additionally, the more localized the level of the dispute, the more local customs, practices, and traditions come into play. And it's precisely this, that your nimble tongue and sharp intellect can often exploit.

Human health is a complex matter, but as far back as ancient writers, the basic idea that what happens inside the body is just as important as what happens on the outside has emerged (and has been repeated throughout the ages). In particular, sunlight, air and greenery are considered beneficial sources. You follow this to the letter, and that's why the medication you take has a more pronounced effect on you.

Human health is a complex matter, but even ancient authors have noted, throughout the ages that what happens inside the body is just as important as what happens outside. Sunlight, air, and greenery are considered particularly beneficial resources. You adhere to this principle abundantly, and therefore, medications have a more pronounced effect on you.

Medieval medicine is based on the knowledge and writings of ancient philosophers, especially Galen, Avicenna and Hippocrates. It's focus is on the care of the balance of body and spirit and maintaining health practices between rest and physical exercise.

The tales about the Leshys vary. According to some, they are bloodthirsty beasts, kidnapping young girls and strangling travellers. Others say they are just vicious rascals who like to lead travellers off the roads and jump down their necks. Whoever hears them must not answer Leshy's call, otherwise he will attract his attention and quite possibly seal his fate. Your Survival skill is so advanced that you can match the Leshy in many ways.

The name gladiator is derived from the Roman short sword gladius. In the Middle Ages, however, gladiatores were called professional fighters, most often swordsmen. They did not fight in the sands of the Colosseum, but were often hired as a proxy in duels when the law allowed.

The term "gladiator" is derived from the short Roman sword, the gladius. However, in the Middle Ages, the term "gladiatores" was used for professional fighters, most often swordsmen. They didn't fight in the sands of the Colosseum, but were often hired as proxies in duels if the law allowed it.

You lose restedness 4 0 %faster and every time you sleep, there's a chance your sleepwalking legs will take you somewhere else.
You lose restedness 40 % faster and every time you sleep, there's a chance your sleepwalking legs will take you somewhere else.
They say you spend half your life sleeping. That's a good thing. Perhaps the other half won't be so awful.
They say you spend half your life sleeping. That's a good thing. Perhaps the other half won't be so awful.

Your excessive sweating causes your clothing to get dirty 50 % faster as well as start to smell. When you do start to stink, you can be smelled from twice as far away, which makes stealth more difficult. Not even perfume will help to hide this stench.

Your excessive sweating causes your clothing to get dirty 50 % faster as well as start to smell. When you do start to stink, you can be smelled from twice as far away, which makes stealth more difficult. Not even perfume will help to hide this stench.
If you were a tanner, nobody would find it odd that you smell awful. Only you're not a tanner.
If you were a tanner, nobody would find it odd that you smell awful. Only you're not a tanner.
The weapons you forge will have excellent properties and will therefore damage 20 % slower.
The weapons you forge will have excellent properties and will therefore take damage 20 % slower.
You were taught to quench the steel by your father Martin, but later you mastered the difficult art of blacksmithing to such an extent that you rarely actually produce a piece of junk.
Your father Martin taught you how to temper steel, but later you mastered this demanding blacksmithing skill to the extent that you rarely produce a faulty item.
In combat, your stamina will regenerate 10 % faster.
In combat, your stamina will regenerate 10 % faster.
In combat, your stamina will additionally recover 10 % faster.
In combat, your stamina will recover an additional 10 % faster.
Even a skilled warrior can succumb to an opponent if he has poor stamina and wears down too easily. You, however, do not forget this and continue to hone this essential skill.
Even a skilled warrior can fall to an opponent if he has poor stamina and wears down too easily. You, however, have not forgotten this and continue to hone this essential skill.
You've been through many skirmishes and battles, which has taught you that the fight can be long and you need to keep enough strength until the very end.
You've been through many skirmishes and battles, which has taught you that combat can be lengthy and you need to preserve strength until the very end.
A wound that would normally kill you won't, and you'll recover 25 % of your health. Once used, there is a cooldown before the perk can be activated again.
A wound that would normally kill you won't, and you'll recover 25 % of your health. Once used, there is a cooldown before the perk can be activated again.
You have a powerful intercessor in the heavens or you are just a favorite of fickle Lady Fortune.
You either have a powerful advocate in the heavens or are simply favored by the fickle Lady Luck.
Polearm weapons will get damaged 25 % slower.
Wooden shafts take a beating in battle, so it's a good idea not to skimp on this part of the weapon. You don't want to find yourself in the middle of a battle with a broken pole in your hand.
Wooden shafts take a beating in battle, so it's a good idea not to skimp on this part of the weapon. You don't want to find yourself in the middle of a battle with a broken pole in your hand.

If you are carrying a sack or even a dead or unconscious body, their weight only counts as a half. Therefore, they are less likely to overencumber you, and carrying them will now not cost you any extra stamina.
In addition, your carrying capacity is permanently increased by 8 pounds.

If you carry a sack or even a dead or unconscious body, the weight only counts as a half. Therefore, they will hardly burden you, and carrying them will no longer cost you extra stamina.
Additionally, your carrying capacity is permanently increased by 8 pounds.
You grew up in a forge where hard work was never in short supply. And you find a certain amount of satisfaction in it.
You grew up in a forge where hard work was never in short supply. And you find a certain satisfaction in it.
You can also get fur, trophies, selected cuts of meat and offal from the killed game.
You can also get fur, trophies, selected cuts of meat and offal from killed game.

The poacher usually cuts only the best pieces from the hunted game. These he hides in a poach (hence the name of his dishonest craft) and leaves the rest lying on the ground. You know, however, that it is no mere pastime to kill a living creature, and if it is done, nothing should be wasted.

A poacher usually only cuts the best pieces from the game he kills. He hides them in a poach (hence the name of his dishonest trade) and leaves the rest to waste. However, you know that killing a living creature is not a vain pastime, and if it happens, nothing should go to waste.
If you hit your target in the chest, your shot will do 10 % more damage. The effect will also apply when hit from behind.
If you hit your target in the chest, your shot will do 10 % more damage. The effect will also apply when hitting from behind.
If you hit your target in the chest, your shot will additionally deal 25 % more damage. The effect will also apply when hit from behind.
If you hit your target in the chest, your shot will deal a total of 25 % more damage. Shots to the heart from behind will also trigger this effect.
They say what's on the heart is on the tongue. You, however, prefer silent concentration and aiming for the Ventricle.
They say what's in the heart is on the tongue. You, however, prefer silent concentration and aiming for the Ventricle.
Your Marksmanship skill is breathtaking. And your shots are literally heartbreaking.
Your Marksmanship skill is breathtaking. And your shots are literally heartbreaking.
When you're in the positivite phase of drunkenness, you gain a +4 bonus to your Craftsmanship skill.
When you're in the positive phase of drunkenness, you gradually gain up to a +4 bonus on your Craftsmanship skill.
Even hard work goes better with beer and blacksmithing especially. It's hot at the forge, and plenty of fluids are essential for work safety.
Work goes more smoothly with a beer in hand, especially blacksmithing. It's hot at the forge, and staying hydrated is essential for safety.
Repairs by craftsmen will be 20 % cheaper for you.
Repairs by craftsmen will be 20 % cheaper for you.
Your hands are both healthy, you've got skills to spare, only your workshop is lacking. You'll be glad to take the opportunity to put your hands to work, especially if it saves you a few groshen.
Your hands are healthy, you've got skills to spare, you only lack a workshop. You're happy to put your hands to work, especially if it saves you a few groschen.
Your first shot will do 15 % more damage. The perk will be active again after the end of the fight in which it was used or in one minute if no fight took place.
Your first shot will do 15 % more damage. The perk will be active again after the end of the fight in which it was used or in one minute if no fight took place.
Your first shot will deal 15 % more damage, for a total of 30 % with the first perk level. The rest of the effect remains unchanged.
Your first shot will deal 15 % more damage, for a total of 30 % with the first perk level. The rest of the effect remains unchanged.
Henry shoots first, no matter what anyone says, Henry just shoots first!
Hal shoots first, no matter what anyone says, Hal just shoots first!
No tough guy or criminal element is gonna come after you because Henry shoots first! Always in self-defense, of course.
No tough guy or criminal will come after you because Hal shoots first! Always in self-defense, of course.
For every 5 levels of Strength, your Charisma increases by 1.
For every 5 levels of Strength, your Charisma increases by 1.
You've worked yourself up to look like a reborn Heracles. When you walk by, your muscles just play and your broad back covers the sun. The women watch you longingly and men look down enviously.
You've built yourself up to look like a reborn Hercules. When you walk by, your muscles ripple and your broad back blocks out the sun. Women gaze at you admiringly, and men look down in envy.
If a guard is searching you, there's a 33 % chance he won't find stolen items on you.
If a guard searches you, there's a 33 % chance he won't find stolen items on you.

A skilled grasper knows the best place to hide valuables. Finally, being smart isn't necessarily the only thing under the hat. Shoes should also be inspected, coats and other overcoats properly searched, and hoods definitely not to be skipped. Fortunately, guards are generally unaware of such hiding places.

A skilled pickpocket knows the best places to hide valuables. After all, being smart isn't the only thing you should have under your hat. Boots need to be checked, coats and other outerwear thoroughly searched, and hoods should definitely not be overlooked. Fortunately, guards generally have no idea about such hiding spots.

You can command Mutt to sniff out places of interest or hunted game. To do this, select the "Free!" command. He'll alert you by barking if he finds something. Thanks to your loyal companion, you won't miss a thing.

You can command Mutt to sniff out places of interest or hunted game. To do this, select the "Free!" command. He'll alert you by barking if he finds something. Thanks to your loyal companion, you won't miss a thing.
Mutt can find anything. I mean, except his own tail.
Mutt can find anything. Except for his own tail, that is.
Therefore, if you inflict a bleeding wound with a Polearm weapon, the bleeding opponent will bleed faster and thus fall sooner.
If you inflict a bleeding wound with a Polearm weapon, the wounded person will bleed faster and thus fall sooner.
A Polearm weapon is literally a massive piece of iron on a two-meter pole, so by definition it will inflict horrific injuries.
A polearm is literally a massive piece of iron on a long wooden pole, so by definition it will inflict horrific injuries.
After 10 seconds of fast sprinting, you will briefly get a big bonus to stamina recovery. When you slow down afterwards, you'll quickly regain your strength and can start running forward again.
After 10 seconds of fast sprinting, you will briefly get a big bonus on stamina recovery. When you slow down afterwards, you'll quickly regain your strength and can start running again.
As an experienced ranger, you can move quickly and not get too tired even when covering long distances or difficult terrain.
As an experienced ranger, you can move quickly and not get too tired even when covering long distances or difficult terrain.
You can command a hunting order to the Mutt and send him out to hunt wild game. You'll find that he'll be a great help to you!
You can command Mutt to hunt and send him after wild game. You'll find that he's a great help to you!
Hunting dogs are highly valued among the lords. Mutt is far from them, but when he catches a scent, he does not do badly at all.
Hunting dogs are highly valued among the gentry. Mutt is far from being one, but once he catches the scent, he does quite well.
If you commit a minor crime offence while drunk, you can try to make an excuse for your less than fully present state when you are arrested.
If you commit a minor crime while drunk, you can try to excuse yourself by claiming your impaired state.
They can't get you sober! And you'll be no good to them drunk and unconscious anyway. In pre-modern times, the drunkenness of the perpetrator was often taken as a mitigating factor.

They can't catch you sober! Being drunk to the point of unconsciousness makes you useless to them anyway. In pre-modern times, a perpetrator's drunkenness was often considered a mitigating circumstance.
The person youre robbing may not see you, so you can reach even into their front pouch, but while you're rummaging through their pockets, they might still feel your presence.
You can reach into your victim's front pouch when robbing them from behind, but you can still be discovered while you're rummaging around.
It's simple, people carry more valuable items in their front pouches because they think it's hard to steal from them. But that's why they don't pay as much attention to it. You know what I mean?
It's simple, people carry more valuable items in their front pouches because they think it's hard to steal from them. Which is why they don't pay as much attention to them. Get it?
When attacking with a fully charged attack, such an attack will be slightly faster and 5 % stronger.
When attacking with a fully charged attack, such an attack will be slightly faster and 5 % stronger.

The attack from the top swing is probably the easiest and most effective for a pole weapon. When fighting in formation, this will be fully sufficient for the basics, and therefore good to have it in your arm.

An attack from an overhead swing is probably the easiest and most effective for a pole weapon. In formation fighting, this is fully sufficient as a basic attack, so it's good to have this skill at hand.
Fully charged attacks made from the saddle will be 10 % stronger.
Fully charged attacks made from the saddle will be 10 % stronger.
Charge! Vengeance is your sword! Fury is your steed!
Charge! Vengeance is your sword! Fury is your steed!
When you're in the mood, your stamina recovers faster. And the more you are drunk, the faster you get up to 50 % increase!
When you're drunk, your stamina recovers faster. And the drunker you are, the quicker it regenerates, up to a 50 % increase!
You're old, but you don't want to admit it. Luckily, there's booze to help you with that. Once you get boozed up, your body seems to have forgotten all those years and it's working properly again.
You're old, but you don't want to admit it. Luckily, there's booze to help with that. Once you get boozed up, your body seems to forget all those years and starts working properly again.

The weight of the armour you wear affects your speed of movement and how much stamina sprinting depletes. Using this perk, your armour will weigh you down 20 lbs less, thus having a lesser effect on your stamina. Neither the actual weight of your armour nor your carrying capacity will change, however.

The weight of the armour you wear affects your speed of movement and how much stamina sprinting depletes. Using this perk, your armour will weigh you down 20 lbs less, thus having a lesser effect on your stamina. Neither the actual weight of your armour nor your carrying capacity will change, however.

The tales of knights who could barely move under the weight of their armour are just silly stories. Yet armour weighs something, and an inexperienced warrior can tire easily. You are accustomed to the weight, and you know how to fasten and adjust your armour well so that it restricts you as little as possible.

Tales of knights who could barely move under the weight of armour are just silly tales. Nevertheless, armour does weigh something, and an inexperienced fighter can easily tired. You are accustomed to the burden and know how to properly fasten and adjust your armour to limit your movements as little as possible.
After performing a combo you will get back some of your stamina so you can continue in the fight more easily.
After performing a combo you regain some of your stamina so you can continue fighting more easily.
A pole weapon may seem clumsy, but a skilled warrior can wield it with almost as much elegance as a longsword. Not least because many of the techniques use the same principles.
A pole weapon may seem unwieldy, but an experienced warrior can wield it with almost the same elegance as a longsword. This is partly because many techniques utilize the same principles

Each of your subsequent attacks with the Polearm weapon in an unbroken chain will deal more damage than the previous one. A series of strikes can be interrupted by a Perfect block or dodge on your opponent's side, or by too much delay between attacks or getting hit on your side.

Each subsequent attack with a polearm in an uninterrupted series will deal more damage than the previous one. The sequence can be interrupted by a Perfect block or dodge by the opponent, a long delay between attacks, or taking damage.
The thing is to keep distance and beat the shit out of any adversary who enters your reach. And do it fast, no breaks.
The key is to maintain distance and relentlessly beat down any adversary who comes within your reach. And do it quickly, with no breaks.

If you hit someone, who doesn't know about you with a ranged weapon, the hit enemy will be affected with a combat skill debuff, making him easier to deal with. Unless he'd rather just run away in a panic.
If you hit someone who doesn't know of your presence with a ranged weapon, your target will suffer a combat skill debuff, making them easier to deal with. They might even panic and flee.
Strike unseen, cause damage, sow panic, and quickly disappear into the shadows again. Not very heroic, but a very effective way of fighting, especially when the enemy is outnumbered.
Strike unseen, cause damage, sow panic, and quickly disappear into the shadows. Not very heroic, but a very effective way of fighting, especially when you're outnumbered.
You get a bonus of +2 to skill checks. You'll also get twice the amount of experience from these skill checks.
You get a bonus of +2 to skill checks. You'll also get twice the amount of experience from these skill checks.
There are times when you have to prove your skills, but most of the time its enough to just fake it, which you excel at.
There are times when you have to prove your skills, but most of the time its enough to just fake it, which you excel at.

Each of your subsequent unarmed attacks in an unbroken line will do more damage than the previous one. A series of attacks can be interrupted by a successful block or dodge by the opponent, delaying too much between attacks, or by getting hit.

This perk will also activate after performing a stealh takedown.

Each of your subsequent unarmed attacks in an unbroken line will do more damage than the last. The sequence of attacks can be interrupted if your opponent succesfully blocks or dodges the attack, delaying too much between attacks, or by getting hit.

This perk will also activate after performing a stealth takedown.
Just beat the shit out of them.
Just beat the shit out of them.
People will sooner forget the crimes you've committed. It'll also reduce the chances of the guards wanting to search you.
People will forget the crimes you've committed more quickly. It'll also reduce the chance of guards wanting to search you.
Many of those who have met you say there is something special about you. They just can't remember exactly what it is... Or maybe they mistook you for someone else? Who knows?
Many of those who have met you say there's something unusual about you. They just can't quite remember what it is... Or perhaps they've mistaken you for someone else? Who knows?
When you sleep outside the civilization, your dog keeps you warm. The quality of beds will therefore increase up to 20 % but at most up to 50 % of the bed quality.
When sleeping in the wilderness, your dog keeps you warm. The bed quality will therefore increase by 20 % but not exceeding 50 % of the bed quality.
During the harsh winters, the village folk often drove the cattle into the shed to keep each other a little warmer. Mutt may not be a cow, but it works the same way.
During harsh winters, village folk often drove cattle into the shed to keep each other a little warmer. Mutt may not be a cow, but it works the same way.
If you get your gear repaired by a craftsman, you'll gain a little experience into Craftsmanship. The experience you gain will grow with the price of the repair.
If you get your gear repaired by a craftsman, you'll gain a little experience in Craftsmanship. The experience you gain will increase along with the repair price.
Every craftsman has some tricks up his sleeve, and you're lucky enough to have a keen eye, so you'll be able to learn some of the improvements.
Each craftsman has their own tricks and techniques, and you're fortunate to have a keen eye, so you can pick up on many improvements by observing them.
Blocking while using a polearm will be easier, more effective, and will cost you less stamina.
Blocking while using a polearm will be easier, more effective, and will cost you less stamina.
One of the main advantages of polearms is their long range. Therefore, it is of utmost importance to be able to keep the opponent at the right distance.
One of the main advantages of polearms is their long range. Therefore, it is of utmost importance to keep the opponent at the right distance.
If you are wearing plate armour, you gain a bonus to Charisma ranging from +1 to +4.
When you wear plate armour, you gain a bonus on Charisma ranging from +1 to +4.
While armour is primarily for protection, it can give its wearer the dignity he deserves. The iron-clad lord is as majestic to look at as the king himself.
While armour is primarily for protection, it can give its wearer the dignity he deserves. The iron-clad lord looks as majestic as the king himself.
Melee attacks from horseback will cost you 15 % less stamina and make it harder for enemies to knock you off your horse.
Melee attacks from horseback will cost you 15 % less stamina and it will be harder for enemies to unseat you.
Mastering the basics of mounted combat is a necessary part of every squire's training. So don't let yourself be embarrassed and make yourself and Lord Capon a good name!
Mastering the basics of mounted combat is a basic part of every squire's training. So don't slack off, and make a good name for yourself and Lord Capon!
All your attacks made during the clinch will deal 10 % more damage.
All attacks made during a clinch will deal 10 % more damage.
All strikes made during the clinch will deal an additional 15 % more damage.
All attacks made during a clinch will deal an additional 15 % more damage.
You like to close the distance in a fight to make a use of your wrestling skills.
You like to close the distance in a fight to make a use of your wrestling skills.
You can also use your wrestling skills to fight with weapons if you get close enough to your opponent.
You can utilize wrestling skills even in weapon combat, provided you get close enough to your opponent
The effects of the potions and alcohol will last longer, and your eventual hangovers will be a little shorter.
The effects of potions and alcohol will last longer, and your eventual hangovers will be a little shorter.

You've already spent endless hours at the Aalchemy bench. Thanks to the regular inhalation of various vapours, your body has already got used to absorbing all kinds of substances and breaking down their negative effects faster.

You've spent countless hours at the alchemist's table. Thanks to regularly inhaling various fumes, your body has gotten used to absorbing all sorts of substances and quickly mitigating their negative effects.
You'll also gain a small amount of experience to Strength skill when collecting herbs.
When collecting herbs, you'll also gain a small amount of experience in Strength skill.
Herb forays and digging around in flower gardens are good for you, and you've learned how to combine them with honest training.
Herb forays and digging around in flower gardens are good for you, and you've learned how to combine them with honest training.
If you were supposed to get a hangover while you sleep, you won't get it. Plus, when you're drunk, all the beds are 10 % more comfortable, so you sleep like a king.
If you were meant to get a hangover while sleeping, now you won't. Plus, when you're drunk, all the beds are 10 % more comfortable, so you sleep like a king.
Send a few in for the night, and off to bed! The next day, almost nobody would know you'd been stoned like cattle last night. That's a kind of art...
Have a few nightcaps, and off to bed! The next day, almost no one would realise you'd been drunk as a skunk the night before. That's a kind of art...

If you defeat an opponent without a weapon, your Unarmed Combat skill will count as 3 more and your stamina will recover 25 % faster, making the rest easier to deal with. The effect will last for 30 seconds.
If you defeat an opponent unarmed, your Unarmed Combat skill will count as 3 more and your stamina will recover 25 % faster, making the rest easier to deal with. The effect will last for 30 seconds.
Beating the first opponent is always the most challenging. The rest is just a repetition.
Beating the first opponent is always the most challenging. The rest is just repetition.

You're able to recognize the difficulty of skillchecks, but not your chances of succeeding. You'll still have to decide for yourself whether it's worth the risk. The effect of your reputation isn't taken into account in the displayed difficulty.

You're able to recognize the difficulty of skillchecks, but not your chances of succeeding. You'll still have to decide for yourself whether it's worth the risk. The effect of your reputation isn't taken into account in the displayed difficulty.
Grammar, rhetoric, and dialectics, the three liberal arts taught and cultivated in the faculties of the arts, are essential equipment for anyone who wishes to move mountains with words.
Grammar, rhetoric, and dialectics, the three liberal arts taught and cultivated in arts faculties, are essential equipment for anyone who wishes to move mountains with words.
Mutt will defend you in battle and even attack the enemy himself at your command.
Mutt will defend you in battle and even attack enemies at your command.

Many legends tell how brave dogs saved the lives of saints or kings when defending them against enemies. You're no mythical hero, and Mutt is far from a well bred hound, but you can count on him not to let you down.

Many legends tell of brave dogs saving the lives of saints or kings by defending them against enemies. You're no legendary hero, and Mutt is far from a well bred hound, but you can rely on him not to leave you in the lurch.
If you are in an area where you have a good reputation (60 or more), you gain a +2 bonus to Strength, Agility, Vitality, and Speech.
If you are in an area where you have a good reputation (60 or more), you gain a +2 bonus on Strength, Agility, Vitality, and Speech.
When a settlement needs help, you are more than happy to answer the call!
When a settlement needs help, you are more than happy to answer the call!

When picking locks, your Thievery skill will count as 3 higher, so it'll be a lot easier. Plus, you can also make use of scrap iron, so you'll get an extra 1-3 lockpicks for each item you successfully forge.

When picking locks, your Thievery skill will count as 3 higher, so it'll be a lot easier. Plus, you can also make use of scrap iron, so you'll get an extra 1-3 lockpicks for each item you successfully forge.
Knowing how to forge and properly assemble a lock is a valuable and difficult skill. And who knows how to make a lock, can break it more easily, that makes sense.
Knowing how to forge and properly assemble a lock is a valuable and difficult skill. And he who knows how to make a lock, can break it more easily, that makes sense.
Attacks with Polearm weapons will cost you 10 % less stamina.
Attacking with polearms will cost you 10 % less stamina.
Attacks with Polearms will cost you additionally 10 % less stamina.
Attacks with Polearms will cost you an additional 10 % less stamina.
The long shaft allows you to quickly move your hands and change your grip so that the leverage exerted by the weight of the weapon is greater or lesser as needed.
The long shaft allows you to quickly move your hands and change your grip so that the leverage exerted by the weight of the weapon is greater or lesser as needed.
The long shaft allows you to quickly move your hands and change your grip so that the leverage exerted by the weight of the weapon is greater or lesser as needed.
The long shaft allows for quick hand adjustments and grip changes, so the leverage exerted by the weapon's weight can be greater or lesser as needed.

If you successfully steal any item in the thief minigame, you will always get a few extra groschen. And if you're looting a dead person, you know where to reach, which is why you'll be able to find a bit more money on them.

If you successfully steal any item in the thief minigame, you will always get a few extra groschen. And if you're looting a dead person, you know where to search, thus you can find a bit more money on them.
You taki the popular saying "You can't take that to the grave with you!" very seriously, even if you interpret it somewhat peculiarly.
You take the folk saying "You can't take it with you to the grave!" very seriously, although you interpret it somewhat peculiarly.
If you have your dog with you, your Charisma will be increased by 3.
When you have your dog with you, your Charisma is increased by 3.
People tend to think better of other people if they have a dog with them. Maybe strange, maybe short-sighted, but it's true.
People tend to think better of other people who have a dog with them. It may seem strange, perhaps shortsighted, but that's the way it is.
The more you're in the drunken mood, the higher chance you have of not wasting your badge when you use it.
The more drunk you are, the higher chance you have of not wasting your badge when you use it.

Booze and gambling go hand in hand and have gotten many unfortunate people into trouble. But you have thought it out cleverly, you have no estate so you cannot lose it rashly. You can have a few tankards without fear, and pass the time with a game of dice.

Booze and gambling go hand in hand and have caused trouble for many an unfortunate soul. But youve got it smartly figured outyou dont own any property, so you cant lose it recklessly. Without fear, you can have a few drinks and pass the time with a game of dice.
When collecting herbs, you have a chance of finding another herb or a small treasure.
When collecting herbs, you have a chance to find an additional herb or a small treasure.
Not only do you have good fortune, but you also have a keen eye, an eye for detail and a talent for not overlooking what others would hardly notice.
Not only do you have good fortune, but also keen eyesight, an eye for detail and a talent for noticing what others would overlook.
If you manage to perform a combo, you gain +5 to your Sword Fighting skill, making following attacks, if needed, easier and more powerful. The effect lasts for 30 seconds.
When you perform a combo, you gain +5 to your Swordsmanship skill, making subsequent attacks easier to perform and more powerful. The effect lasts for 30 seconds.
You're a master swordsman and you can tell! Not only are you good at blade work, but you enjoy it very much.
You're a master swordsman and it shows! Not only are you good at blade work, but you enjoy it very much.

If you cook, dry or smoke an unspoiled ingredient or food, after processing it will have a 100 % condition. It does not apply to herbs, as they always have a 100 % condition after drying, regardless of the perk.

If you cook, dry or smoke an unspoiled ingredient or food, after processing it will have a 100 % condition. It does not apply to herbs, as they always have a 100 % condition after drying, regardless of the perk.
You enjoy cooking and love to try new recipes or improve old ones. Thanks to this, you have learned how to handle ingredients in a truly masterful way.
You enjoy cooking and love to try new recipes or improve old ones. As a result, you have learned to handle ingredients masterfully.
Your arrows and bolts have better ballistic properties, so they fly faster, travel farther and have more penetration.
Your arrows and bolts have better ballistic properties, so they fly faster, travel farther and have more penetration.
You like to take care of your hunting gear and choose only the best. None of your arrows are crooked, and your fletching is always tight, straight and perfectly trimmed.
You like to take care of your hunting gear and choose only the best. None of your arrows are crooked, and your fletching is always tight, straight and perfectly trimmed.
You've perfected your feint to the point that it's very difficult for even an experienced warrior to respond to it.
You've perfected your feint to the point that it's very difficult for even an experienced warrior to respond to it.
A quick trick may seem like a trivial manoeuvre, but it can be non-trivially lethal.
A quick feint may seem like a trivial manoeuvre, but it can be non-trivially lethal.
In order to perform a Master strike, you must attack at the moment of the enemy's attack from the opposite zone than the attack is led. This will stop his attack and hit him with your own attack.
To perform a master strike, you must attack at the moment of the enemy's attack from the opposite direction. This stops their attack and hits them with your own.

Master strikes, sometimes also called secret strikes, are techniques that allow the swordsman, if executed correctly, to cover or stop an opponent's attack and hit him at the same time. In the Lichtenauer tradition of fencing, there are five such strikes, each suitable against a different attack, and a true master must be able to not only execute the strikes, but also choose which one to use in a flash.

Master strikes, sometimes called secret strikes, are techniques that allow a swordsman, if executed correctly, to parry or stop an opponent's attack while simultaneously striking them. In the Lichtenauer tradition of swordfighting, there are five such strikes, each suitable against different attacks. A true master must not only be able to execute these strikes but also quickly choose the right one to use
Easy locks can be unlocked almost instantly, without the need to activate the minigame and commit a crime. Even so, be careful, because looting a chest opened like that is still a crime.

Changes in your reputation, good or bad, spread more across the county and among groups of people.

Thought without action is only half and deeds are what speak for a person.

When Fortuna gives, you have to take it by the handful.

Your carrying capacity is increased by 12 pounds.

You're strong and also not stupid. So you know philosophizing isn't gonna carry your backpack for you.

You will improve faster in Sword Fighting, Crafting and Survival skills, as all experience gained will be 10 % higher.

Father Martin raised you to be modest, honest, straightforward, honest worker and love your craft. And because elders should inspire the young, he lived that way himself. His time has come and gone, but you carry on his legacy.

Sir Radzig is a complicated person. In pursuit of his often noble goals, he does not hesitate to resort to deception and subterfuge if it helps the situation, and there is much you can, or perhaps must, learn from him.

Sir Radzig is a complicated person. In pursuit of his often noble goals, he does not hesitate to resort to deception and subterfuge if it helps the situation, and there is much you can, or perhaps must, learn from him.
The dirtier you are, the harder it will be for others to spot you. But beware, they can still smell you if you're accompanied by a proper odour as well.

When Mutt flees, the time it takes for him to come back to you is a quarter shorter.

Mutt may have wandering in his blood, but you're convinced he'd never leave you for good.

The effects of the negative phase of drunkenness will be milder for you.

A skilled rider knows how to properly spur the horse and get the most out of it. But a good rider also knows not to do it too often, and to give the horse a rest and reward him for obedience.

If you fight against outnumbered opponents, your attack will be 10 % stronger.

You have achieved a true and renowned mastery of shooting. Your only concern is to have enough ammunition, because only the most armoured enemies witstand your firing.

I'm gonna find ya, I'm gonna get ya, I'm gonna beat ya. One way, or the other...

There are a few as accurate as you with a blade and sword tip!

Herring's stats are now significantly increased.

You got Herring from Lord Bergov at Trosky. You guess they picked him for you because he wasn't one of the best and nobody really wanted him. In many ways it reminded you of yourself, and you have a soft spot and sympathy for Herring and his ilk. This technique is very effective against inexperienced swordsmen, and a duel of two master swordsman is often a chain of Perfect Blocks followed by ripostes until one of them slips up.

Your heavy weapon attacks will be more difficult for your opponents to cover with a shield. It will also take less time to completely destroy your opponent's shield with your strikes.

The Rangers, sometimes referred to as the vanguard, were light armoured, ranged infantry whose task was to inflict casualties on the enemy before the actual battle, to explore the land , to secure the flanks or rear, or to make quick strikes followed by withdrawal. You've also mastered this skill.

Philosophy is a demanding discipline, and theology, the ruler of all learning, is too. In order to embrace truths that transcend everyday existence, it is also necessary to free one's mind from the shackles of mundanity and open it to all knowledge.

As it has been said many times before, it is important to tire the opponent in battle and to retain enough strength to defeat him. The ability to parry even powerful blows with ease will help you do this.

You can consume raw meat without fear of poisoning.

The Tartars did indeed carry raw meat with them, but not to eat. They put it on horses and warriors' wounds for a cooling and healing effect. The actual dish did not originate until the early 20th century in France, and the legend of meat being placed under the saddle probably even later. But you were ahead of your time and thought to try the raw meat delicacies much earlier - and how you liked them.

The Tartars did indeed carry raw meat with them, but not to eat. They put it on horses' and warriors' wounds for cooling and healing. The actual dish didn't originate until the early 20th century in France, and the legend of meat being placed under the saddle probably even later. If have a dagger equipped, you can perform a stealth kill maneuver. All you have to do is sneak up behind your unsuspecting victim and initiate a chokehold. Then be ready to press the attack to deliver the killing blow. May God have mercy on your soul.

You can stealthily knock people out. To do this, sneak up to your victim and initiate a chokehold. Then be ready to press to block key to finish the action and knock out your opponent. They inhabit forests and wild lands and are not considered downright evil, but rather mischievous, sometimes malicious and wary of man, sometimes playful and helpful. They often served as a heraldic motif or as a villain figure in courtly games.

You're constantly on the move during combat. You nimbly change sides, length of steps or distance between you and your opponent. You rush at the enemy like a steep river, always finding a way to get through. And whoever is caught in the current will not return home alive.

Now you will be able to forge weapons of the fourth, i.e. the highest quality. Weapons of this quality cannot be obtained in any other way than by forging them yourself, and their strength and effectivness is unmatched.

In order to perform a masterstrike, you must attack at the moment of your opponent's attack from the opposite zone to the one in which his attack is led. This will stop his attack and hit him with your own attack.
To execute a master strike, you need to attack at the moment your opponent strikes, but from the opposite zone of their attack. This will stop their attack and land your own hit.
You can use the principle of a masterstrike, i.e. simultaneous block and your own attack, even without a weapon if you are facing an unarmed opponent.
The principle of the master strike, a simultaneous block and attack, can also be used unarmed against an unarmed opponent.
If you are fighting against outnumbered enemies, your stamina will recover 20 % faster.
If you are outnumbered in a fight, your stamina will recover 20 % faster.

Outnumbering is usually fatal to knights. But you were not taught to fight by the masters of the court. You learned on your own, with every opponent you defeated, and you know how to handle yourself against superior numbers. Don't let your enemies behind your back, wear them down, and finish them off one by one.

Being outnumbered is usually fatal for knights. However, you weren't taught to fight by masters of the court. You taught yourself, through each defeated opponent, and can handle being outnumbered. Dont let enemies get behind you, wear them down, and take them out one by one.
If your Charisma is higher than 20, your armor will be increased by 15 .
If your Charisma is higher than 20, your armour will be considered 15 higher.
Looking like the unthreatened hero of legend is the first step of performing heroic deeds. And that's the first step to entering the legends.
Looking like an intrepid hero of legends is the first step to performing heroic deeds. And that's the first step to entering into legend.

That feeling when you leave others in the dust behind you!

The one who stands at the head of the formation and is the first to meet the enemy usually gets the most glory. That is often your place, where you have learned how to cover yourself properly and save your strength in battle.

When the Serbian prince Lazar Hrebeljanovic was struck by an arrow, all seemed lost. But the prince scrambled to his horse and mounted a heroic charge against the Ottoman army... Even after all these years, you vividly recall the shining banners and the endless slaughter that followed. Although the battle was a draw, whoever was left alive at the time can call himself a victor.

Use the full length of your weapon and the strength of your arms to stab quickly, and then don't wait unnecessarily and retreat deftly back to a safe distance. Such a tactic may look cowardly, but a skilled warrior knows there is deep knowledge behind it.

Beer sates you twice as much, so if youre not afraid of drunkenness, you can more easily replace food with it. However, potions sate you half as much, so you can drink more of them.

The wanderer often cannot choose where to lay his head and must take whatever is available. You, in your many journeys, have long been accustomed to discomfort. It's enough to keep your feet warm and your body dry.

If you are facing an opponent with the same type of weapon as you, you gain a +3 bonus to that weapon skill. For example, if you have a short sword and your opponent has a long sword, or a sword and shield, this perk will not take effect.

Man is, as Aristotle says, a social creature. He lives, thrives and develops in the company of other people. You live in accordance with this teaching because you yourself admire the works of human hands, their infinite inventiveness and their desire to arrange and change things.

The art of transmutation, i.e. the knowledge of the right combination of substances and their transformation into higher and nobler forms.

To make the alchemical process successful, it is necessary to observe the correct cooking time. And the greater your skill, the greater your tolerance if you deviate from it. In addition, to achieve masterful potions, you will need to follow the recipe procedure exactly and have the ingredients as fresh as possible.

Surprisingly, you will gain experience by brewing potions, and the more precisely you follow the procedure, the more experience you will gain.

The art of transmutation, i.e. the knowledge of the right combination of substances and their transformation into higher and nobler forms.

To make the alchemical process successful, it is necessary to observe the correct cooking time. The greater your Alchemy skill, the more you can deviate from it without repercussions. In addition, to achieve truly masterful potions, you will need to follow the recipe procedure exactly and have the ingredients as fresh as possible.

You will gain experience by brewing potions, and the more precisely you follow the procedure, the more experience you will gain.
Bard skill would allow you to woo audience with your stories of valour.

Craft has always been with man and is a showcase of his skill, activity and ingenuity. It is also a source of joy, for few things surpass the satisfaction of one's own work.

As your skill grows, it will become easier to achieve a good result in weapon sharpening or blacksmithing, and you will be able to forge more advanced weapons. You will also be able to repair higher quality items when maintaining your own equipment, and you will generally use fewer resources for repairs or laundry.

You will gain experience by practicing the craft, i.e. blacksmithing, sharpening weapons, and using repair kits or washing clothes.

Increases the time you can hold a perfect block or dodge as well as increasing the defence stat of weapons and shields.

Bibit Hera, bibit herus, bibit miles, bibit clerus, bibit ille, bibit illa, bibit servus cum ancilla!

As your drinking skill increases, alcohol will have less of an effect on you and therefore you won't get drunk as quickly. And if you do, the hangovers will be milder and go away sooner. You'll also be at less risk of succumbing to a pernicious addiction through frequent drinking. But beware, because however high your drinking skill, you will never completely rid yourself of the risk of addiction.

You will unsurprisingly strengthen your drinking skill by drinking all sorts of alcohol or alcohol-based alchemical potions.

Your overall skill as a warrior, reflecting your knowledge of combat and all matters regarding war, your ability to navigate battlefields, the experience gained in countless skirmishes and your growing skill in handling weapons.

The higher your Warfare skill, the faster your attacks will be, and the harder it will be for your opponents to read your intentions and parry your attacks. Your weapons will also take less damage during combat.

Your Warfare level will increase as you improve your skills with individual weapons or unarmed combat.

The art of fighting with heavy weapons. These are characterised by devastating attack and their penetration ability makes them suitable against armour. On the other hand, they won't provide you with much defence. Battlefield experience thus advises combining them with shields and quality armour.

The higher your skill with heavy weapons, the faster your attacks will be, the more damage they will do and the harder it will be for your opponent to defend against them.

You gain experience mainly by fighting with the appropriate weapons.

Heavy weapons include clubs, maces, axes and war hammers.

The art of fighting with heavy weapons. These are characterized by devastating attacks and, due to their penetration power, are suitable for combat against armoured opponents. However, they offer little defense, and martial experience suggests combining them with shields and your own quality armour.

The higher your skill with heavy weapons, the faster your attacks will be, inflicting more damage and making it harder for your opponent to defend against them.

You gain experience primarily through combat with the respective weapons.

Heavy Weapons include clubs, maces, axes and war hammers.

Horsemanship, so the ability to stay in the saddle, knowledge of riding manoeuvres, mounted combat and care of riding animals. Every nobleman or squire should master this art and not be embarrassed by it.

As your skill increases, your horse's stamina consumption will decrease at higher speeds, your horse will be less skittish when threatened, and it will be more difficult for enemies to throw you from the saddle.

You will gain experience by riding unsurprisingly whenever you travel a considerable distance in the saddle. Be careful though, you won't gain experience by using fast travel. And if you commit to mounted combat, you will gain experience for every enemy you overpower from the saddle.

Horsemanship, meaning the ability to stay in the saddle, knowledge of riding manoeuvres, mounted combat and care of riding animals. Every nobleman and man-at-arms should master this art.

As your skill increases, your horse's stamina consumption will decrease when riding at high speeds, your horse will be less skittish when threatened, and it will be more difficult for enemies to throw you from the saddle.

You gain experience by riding whenever you travel a considerable distance in the saddle. Be careful though, you won't gain experience by using fast travel. In mounted combat, you will gain experience of every enemy you defeat from the saddle.

The art of dog handling is highly valued and the dog will be your loyal friend, a kind companion on the road and a fierce defender. He can also find all sorts of interesting things in the area, and as his skill grows, yours will become more obedient, stronger in combat, and slower to tire when hunting. Additionally, you can gain perks that allow you to give your dog new commands.

You gain experience by interacting with your dog and using its skills, whether in combat, hunting, or on the road. Start by remembering to feed him properly and pet him occasionally. This will not only give you experience, but also ensure that your dog doesn't run away from you and obeys your commands correctly.

The art of aiming and hitting with ranged weapons. That means bows, crossbows, and those new hellish black powder contraptions.

Higher skill will make your hand steadier when aiming, making it easier for you to aim and hit.

Experience is gained by shooting, whether in combat, hunting or target competition.

The art of aiming and hitting with ranged weapons, such as bows, crossbows and those new diabolical black powder contraptions.

A higher skill level will manifest primarily in having a steadier hand when aiming, making it easier to aim and hit.

You gain experience by shooting, whether in combat, hunting or target competitions.
Mining skill would allow you to mine silver in Kuttenberg mines.

Scholarship is a concept as wide as the sea and its boundaries are equally unclear. Generally speaking, it represents the sum total of factual knowledge, the ability to make logical deductions, and an understanding of the basic concepts of the medieval world.

Literacy allows you, above all, to read, a far from common skill for medieval man. The more scholarly you are, the faster you will read books and the easier it will be to understand their contents. Scholarship can also come in handy in all sorts of situations and conversations.

You will increase your scholarship mainly by reading books, applying scholarship in conversations, and learning new and interesting knowledge about the world around you.

Scholarship is a concept as wide as the sea and its boundaries are equally unclear. Generally speaking, it represents the sum total of factual knowledge, the ability to make logical deductions, and an understanding of the basic concepts of the medieval world.

Literacy allows you, above all, to read, a far from common skill for medieval man. The more scholarly you are, the faster you will read books and the easier it will be to understand their contents. Scholarship can also come in handy in all sorts of situations and conversations.

You will increase your scholarship mainly by reading books, applying scholarship in conversations, and learning new and interesting knowledge about the world around you.

The art of stealth, deception and concealment. The ability to see and not be seen, to act and to avoid the consequences of one's actions. This art is not discussed in polite society, but everyone knows the value of a good spy, and some even know the importance of a convenient murder. Skullduggery is dishonourable, but if you are good at it, nobody will know it was you.

The higher your skill level, the less noise you will make when sneaking and the harder it will be for enemies to spot and reveal you. You'll also find it easier to avoid complications on the road when using fast travel.

You gain experience by successfully picking someone's pockets, picking a lock, stealthily dispatching an enemy, and especially sneaking close to the enemy.

The art of concealment and camouflage. The ability to observe and not be seen, to act and escape the consequences of one's actions. This art is not talked about in polite society, but everyone knows the value of a good spy, and some know the importance of a suitable murder.

The higher your skill, the less noise you make when sneaking, and the harder it will be for enemies to see and detect you. You will also find it easier to avoid complications on the move when using fast travel.

You gain skill by successfully picking pockets, picking locks, stealthily disposing of enemies, and especially by sneaking near enemies.

Knowledge of the beauties, laws and pitfalls of the world beyond the stone walls of human settlements unites the royal hunters and the last of the rogues.

The higher your skill, the easier it will be to hunt wild beasts and get more meat from them. You will also be able to gather herbs more quickly, and with the use of fast travel, it will be easier for you to escape ambushes and other pitfalls.

You will gain experience primarily by hunting game, then gathering herbs and then processing your catch (drying, smoking, cooking). But also by discovering interesting places in the world and overcoming dangers using fast travel.

Knowledge of the beauties, laws and dangers of the world beyond the stone walls of human settlements unites royal huntsmen and the humblest wanderers alike.

The higher your skill, the easier it will be to hunt wild game and obtain more meat from it. Gathering herbs will also be quicker and using fast travel will make it easier for you to escape ambushes and other pitfalls.

You gain survival experience primarily by hunting game, gathering herbs and processing your catch (drying, smoking, cooking). Additionally, discovering interesting places in the world and overcoming dangers while using fast travel will also contribute to your experience.

Thievery may not be an honorable way to make a living, but if done correctly, it should not cast a shadow of suspicion on your honor.

The skill makes picking locks and picking pockets easier. You can venture into more complex locks as you level up when picking locks, and the whole process will be less susceptible to your mistakes. When picking pockets, your victim is more likely to not notice the slippery hand, making the whole process easier for you, plus you can spot some pocket or bag transformations ahead of time.

It is by picking locks and picking pockets that you gain experience. The stronger the lock you overcome or the more valuable items you manage to pick, the more experience you gain.

Thievery may not be an honourable way to make a living, but if done correctly, not a shadow of suspicion should fall upon your reputation.

This skill makes lockpicking and pickpocketing easier. As your level increases, you can tackle more complex locks and the process will be less sensitive to your mistakes. When pickpocketing, your victim is less likely to notice your probing hand, making the whole process easier, and you'll also be able to identify some items in their pockets or pouches beforehand.

You gain experience by lockpicking and pickpocketing. The stronger the lock you overcome or the more valuable the items you manage to steal, the more experience you will gain.
Dagger skill makes you more proficient with daggers, effectively increasing your weapon stats when you equip a dagger.
Dagger skill makes you more proficient with daggers, effectively increasing your weapon stats when you equip a dagger.

The art of fighting with polearms. These are some of the most common weapons of a medieval soldier, as they are usually cheap to make and are very effective even in the hands of inexperienced fighters when deployed in large numbers, especially in field engagements. However, a skilled warrior can use of such weapon even when alone and take advantage of its advantages, especially its great penetrating power and long reach. That being said, he must be careful not to let the enemy get too close to him, especially in confined spaces. When that happens, it is wiser to draw a sidearm.

The higher your skill, the more powerful and faster your attacks will be.

You gain experience mainly by fighting with the appropriate weapons.

Polearms include all long weapons from spears, voulges and glaives through morning stars and guisarmes to two-handed knightly hammers and axes.

The art of fighting with polearms. These are the most common weapons of the medieval soldier because they are inexpensive to produce and very effective when used in large numbers, even in the hands of inexperienced fighters. However, a seasoned warrior can wield this weapon alone and take advantage of its strengths, particularly its great penetrating power and significant reach.

The higher your skill, the more powerful and faster your attacks will be.

You gain experience primarily through combat with the respective weapons.

Polearms include all long weapons, from spears, halberds and glaives to knightly poleaxes.
Shield skill makes you more proficient with shields in their offensive role, effectively increasing your weapon stats when you equip a shield.
Shield skill makes you more proficient with shields in their offensive role, effectively increasing your weapon stats when you equip a shield.

The skill of fighting with swords and similar weapons. Sword-like weapons are agile and allow you to hit your opponent accurately and quickly, as well as to effectively defend against incoming attacks. Longswords also give you the advantage of longer reach. The biggest disadvantage of these weapons is that they are often less effective against heavily armoured warriors.

The higher your Swords skill, the faster your attacks will be, the more damage they will do, and the harder it will be for your opponents to block them.

Swords skill is gained primarily by fighting using the appropriate weapons.

Sword-like weapons include hunting swords, short swords, longswords, and sabres.

The skill of fighting with swords and similar weapons. Sword-like weapons are agile and allow you to hit your opponent accurately and quickly, as well as to effectively defend against incoming attacks. Longswords also give you the advantage of a longer reach. The biggest disadvantage of these weapons is that they are usually ineffective against heavily armoured foes.

The higher your Swordsmanship skill, the faster your attacks will be, the more damage they will do, and the harder it will be for your opponents to block them.

Swordsmanship experience is gained primarily by fighting using the appropriate weapons.

Sword-like weapons include hunting swords, short swords, longswords, and sabres.

The art of wrestling and unarmed combat, whether a tavern brawl or the knowledge of ringen. After all, it is not always necessary to draw steel and shed blood when a well-aimed punch can usually cool most tempers. Moreover, a true Master is able to prevail even against an armed opponent.

The higher your skill, the more powerful and faster your attack will be and the harder it will be to defend against them.

You gain Unarmed experience especially by fighting without a weapon.

The art of Ringen and unarmed combat, whether it's a tavern brawl or knowledge of wrestling. After all, it's not always necessary to draw steel and shed blood, as a well-aimed punch can usually cool most heads. A true master is also able to stand against an armed opponent.

The higher your skill, the more powerful and faster will be your attacks, and the harder it will be to defend against them.

You gain Unarmed experience, unsurprisingly, by fighting without a weapon.

Although not as prominent as Strength, Dexterity is also a common trait of famous warriors, such as Achilles, Lancelot, Roland, and Robin Hood.

As your Dexterity level increases, melee attacks will cost less stamina and be slightly faster, as will the draw of your bow. Also, your movement will be faster, you'll be less injured by falls, you'll do better at sneaking, you'll find it easier to handle heavy armor, and your dodges in combat will generally be more effective and more difficult to execute.

You'll gain experience by sneaking and primarily by fighting, especially if you use weapons requiring higher levels of dexterity and dodges.

Although it does not have the same prominence as Strength, Agility is also a common trait of famous warriors such as Achilles, Lancelot, Roland and Robin Hood.

As your level of Agility increases, your melee weapon attacks will cost less Stamina and be somewhat faster, as will drawing a bow. Your movement will also be quicker, you will suffer less damage from falls, perform better at stealth, handle heavy armour more effectively and your dodges in combat will be generally more effective and easier to execute.

You gain experience through stealth and primarily through combat, especially if you use weapons that require higher levels of Agility and dodging.

Misti kovskho emesla povaj vhlasu podle proslulosti sv kovrny. m vt kovskou presti mistr m, tm jsou vrobky od nj danj a zrove m vt slovo v kutnohorsk mansk komunit. Presti dle pomh mistru kovi shnt pro svou kovrnu lep vybaven a umouje mu vyzdobit si sdlo luxusnjmi pedmty.

Although the glory of warriors is great, history rightly values those who ruled not by the sword but by the spirit. And the tool of the spirit is the word.

Eloquence and rhetorical skills will help you most in conversations. The higher your level, the more likely you are to succeed in the skillcheck, which will help you in your adventures, save time or help you to gain greater rewards. As far as money is concerned, being eloquent will also make it easier to bargain for prizes.

Experience is gained mainly through conversations and the use of skillchecks. But also by reading books, as this will enrich your vocabulary and improve your rhetorical skills and argumentation.

Although the glory of warriors is great, history ultimately and rightfully values those who ruled not by the sword but by the mind. And the tool of the mind is the word.

Speech and rhetorical skills will assist you most in conversations. The higher your level, the more likely you are to succeed in skill checks, which will aid you in your adventures, save you time or help you gain greater rewards. As for money, your Speech will also make haggling easier.

You gain experience primarily through conversations and using skill checks in them. Also, reading books will enrich your vocabulary and improve your rhetorical skills and argumentation.

The medieval world valued physical fitness and strength above all. Superhuman strength was often attributed to great kings, and is the most common attribute of heroes such as Samson, Herakles, Gawain, Siegfried, Beowulf, and the Bohemian Bivoj.

Strength and its level mainly affects your weapon control and the damage you inflict in melee attacks, as well as the strength of your unarmed attack. It also increases your carrying capacity, allowing you to fully draw powerful bows and making it easier to move and fight in heavy armor.

Experience is primarily gained through combat. If you use weapons that require higher levels of power, you will gain more experience.

The medieval world valued physical fitness and strength above all. Superhuman strength was often attributed to great kings, and is the most common attribute of heroes such as Samson, Herakles, Gawain, Siegfried, Beowulf, and the Bohemian Bivoj.

Strength and its level mainly affects your weapon control and the damage you inflict using melee attacks, as well as the power of your unarmed attacks. It also increases your carrying capacity, allows you to fully draw powerful bows and makes it easier to move and fight in heavy armour.

Experience is primarily gained through combat. If you use weapons that require higher Strength levels, you will gain more experience.

Although not as epic an attribute as strength or agility, it was perhaps valued even more, as it signifies longevity and it is not for nothing that a healthy body is said to house a healthy spirit.

The level of vitality has a particular effect on your stamina supply and the rate at which it recovers in and out of combat. For this reason, it is a very important stat, as it allows you to run and fight longer, attack more often and withstand more hits. It will also make you slower to drop your rest.

You gain experience primarily by fighting, performing advanced techniques or combos. And of course, by continuous training, i.e. running and overcoming obstacles in your way.

Although it is not as epic an attribute as Strength or Agility, it was perhaps valued even more because it leads to longevity, and it is no wonder they say that a healthy body houses a healthy mind.

Your level of Vitality primarily affects your Stamina reserve and the rate of its recovery in and out of combat. For this reason, it is a very important stat, as it allows you to run and fight longer, attack more frequently and withstand more blows. Your level of Rest will also decrease more slowly.

You gain experience primarily through combat, performing advanced techniques or combos and, of course, through regular training such as running and overcoming obstacles in your path.
